value: Locally in southern Europe from southern Portugal to southern Russia, south to the larger Mediterranean islands and north- western Africa (Morocco to Tunisia, south to the Atlas); east locally through Asia Minor, Caucasus, Iran, southern Asiatic steppes, north to about lat. 55° N.; east to Mongolia and northern China. Highly migratory, wintering from Africa to India, Burma, and southern China.
refer: Peter's Checklist of the Birds of the World

value: Resident and Palearctic winter visitor, open areas: resident North Africa; visitor to all S of Sahara except forest of DRC.
Mediterranean basin to e China; winters to s Asia and s Africa

open areas in hot dry climates;little or low vegetation eg.steppe, pastures, semi-desert, cultivation;also around towns;normally lowlands but in Asia to 1500m;in winter, savanna, steppe, low scrub & cultivation

subcat_descr: Bill length (sex unknown) - Nares to tip

value: both ground and non-acrobatic flight displays

subcat_descr: Number of breeding attempts per year
